name: Procter & Gamble Women's Global Leadership Program
description: Provides scholarships to women pursuing graduate degrees in STEM fields.
eligibility: Women pursuing graduate degrees in STEM fields at accredited universities worldwide.

name: L'Or√©al-UNESCO For Women in Science International Rising Talents Program
description: Supports outstanding women scientists at the postdoctoral level.
eligibility: Women scientists in life sciences (including medicine), physical sciences, engineering and mathematics.

name: Google Women Techmakers Scholars Program
description: Provides scholarships to undergraduate and graduate women in computer science.
eligibility: Women studying computer science at universities around the world.

name: Anita Borg Scholarship
description: Supports women in computer science and technology fields.
eligibility: Women pursuing degrees in computer science and related fields.

name: Adobe Women-in-Tech Scholarship
description: Provides scholarships to women pursuing degrees in computer science and related fields.
eligibility: Women pursuing degrees in computer science, engineering, or related fields.

name: SheCodes
description: Offers free and paid coding courses for women.
eligibility: Women interested in learning to code.

name: Google Women Techmakers Scholars Program
description: Provides scholarships to undergraduate and graduate women in computer science.
eligibility: Women studying computer science at universities around the world.

name: Microsoft Learn
description: Offers free online courses and learning paths for various technologies.
eligibility: Anyone interested in learning about Microsoft technologies.
